name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: White Communication PVC Conduit, heavy-duty type, fully complies with AS/NZS 2053 standards. [sizes indicated in the drawing]
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Verify depth and alignment of trench.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Trench base is free of rocks, debris, and sharp objects; min 75 mm layer of compacted sand.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Install conduits as per drawings, ensuring correct position, depth, route, alignment without sagging or sharp bends, secure joints, and proper spacing.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Install conduit bends with bend and radius per drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Check conduits are undamaged and correctly placed as per drawings, replace any damaged sections, and backﬁll with thermal sand.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Install polymer tape 75 mm above the top conduits, in a straight, continuous line before backﬁlling, as per drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Install marker tape 300 mm above the polymer tape, in a continuous straight line as per drawing details, before backﬁlling.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Carry out as-constructed survey pickup to accurately record the location, alignment, and depth of installed conduits.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Backﬁll around conduits with approved material as per drawings.
